alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 09 at 9:04AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Pockets of Light Freezing Drizzle and Sleet will Create Slick Travel... Pockets of light freezing drizzle and sleet are expected through early this afternoon across the Saint Lawrence Valley, Champlain Valley and parts of central and northern Vermont. Untreated surfaces may become icy with areas of slick travel possible through early this afternoon. Precautionary/Preparedness Actions... The light freezing rain and freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use caution...especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
